ModMetaData.name: Human Butchery 2.0
ModMetaData.author: DoctorStupid
ModMetaData.description: Harvest beautiful multicolor skin from beautiful multicolor people. With Biotech: harvest extra heat-resistant skin from fire-resistants like impids, warm fuzzy fur from furries, and harvest extra meat from pigskins who have a new gene that makes them meatier.
